user_query: I'm organizing a workshop on healthy eating habits. Can you provide me with a list of healthcare professionals who can deliver informative sessions? Additionally, analyze the nutritional data for the snacks we'll be serving and suggest healthier alternatives. Moreover, share the vaccination guidelines for adults to ensure a safe environment.

TaskList.description: Search for a list of qualified healthcare professionals specializing in nutrition and healthy eating.
Analyze the nutritional data for the snacks planned for the workshop and identify any unhealthy components.
Suggest healthier alternatives for the identified unhealthy snacks.
Gather and provide the latest vaccination guidelines for adults to ensure safety during the workshop.
